TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ParamArrayAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ParamArrayAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ParamArrayAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 表示方法將允許在引動過程中使用不定數目的引數。

span.span: Indicates that a method will allow a variable number of arguments in its invocation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示方法參數是參數陣列。The indicates that a method parameter is a parameter array. 參數陣列允許的引數數目為 「 不明 」 的規格。A parameter array allows the specification of an unknown number of arguments. 參數陣列必須是最後一個參數，在型式參數清單中，而且它必須是單一維度陣列。A parameter array must be the last parameter in a formal parameter list, and it must be a single-dimension array. 呼叫此方法時，參數陣列會允許方法，在任一種方式中指定的引數：When the method is called, a parameter array permits arguments to a method to be specified in either of two ways: - 為之類型的隱含轉換為參數陣列類型的單一運算式。As a single expression of a type that is implicitly convertible to the parameter array type. 參數陣列函式做為值參數。The parameter array functions as a value parameter. - 為零或多個引數，其中每個引數類型是可隱含轉換的參數陣列項目類型的運算式。As zero or more arguments, where each argument is an expression of a type that is implictly convertible to the type of the parameter array element. 下一節中的範例說明這兩個呼叫慣例。The example in the next section illustrates both calling conventions. > [!NOTE] > 一般而言，不會直接在程式碼。Typically, the is not used directly in code. 相反地，個別語言的關鍵字，例如`ParamArray`在 Visual Basic 中並`params`在 C# 中，所做的包裝函式類別。Instead, individual language keywords, such as `ParamArray` in Visual Basic and `params` in C#, are used as wrappers for the class. 某些語言，例如 C# 中，甚至可能需要的語言關鍵字，並禁止使用。Some languages, such as C#, may even require the use of the language keyword and prohibit the use of . 多載解析期間支援參數陣列的編譯器中遇到不存在，但有一個較少的參數，超過包含的參數陣列的多載的方法多載時它們會以取代方法包含的多載參數陣列。During overload resolution, when compilers that support parameter arrays encounter a method overload that does not exist but has one fewer parameter than an overload that includes a parameter array, they will replace the method with the overload that includes the parameter array. 例如，呼叫`String.Split()`執行個體方法 (這不存在於類別) 會解析成呼叫方法。For example, a call to the `String.Split()` instance method (which does not exist in the class) is resolved as a call to the method. 編譯器也會將所需類型的空陣列傳遞至方法。The compiler will also pass an empty array of the required type to the method. 這表示，方法必須永遠都準備好處理參數陣列中的項目時，其長度為零的陣列。This means that the method must always be prepared to handle an array whose length is zero when it processes the elements in the parameter array. 這個範例將提供說明。The example provides an illustration. 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會定義`Temperature`類別，其中包含`Display`方法，要用來顯示一或多個格式化的溫度值。The following example defines a `Temperature` class that includes a `Display` method, which is intended to display one or more formatted temperature values. 方法具有單一參數， `formats`，其定義為參數陣列。The method has a single parameter, `formats`, which is defined as a parameter array. [!code-csharp[System.ParamArrayAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ParamArrayAttribute/cs/Example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ParamArrayAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ParamArrayAttribute/vb/Example.vb#1)] 下列範例說明三個不同的呼叫，以`Temperature.Display`方法。The following example illustrates three different calls to the `Temperature.Display` method. 首先，會將對方法傳遞格式字串的陣列。In the first, the method is passed an array of format strings. 在第二個，方法會傳遞做為引數的四個個別的格式字串。In the second, the method is passed four individual format strings as arguments. 在第三，方法被呼叫沒有引數。In the third, the method is called with no arguments. 範例輸出所示，Visual Basic 和 C# 編譯器就會將此轉譯成呼叫`Display`具有空的字串陣列的方法。As the output from the example illustrates, the Visual Basic and C# compilers translate this into a call to the `Display` method with an empty string array. [!code-csharp[System.ParamArrayAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ParamArrayAttribute/cs/Example.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ParamArrayAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ParamArrayAttribute/vb/Example.vb#2)]

related.span: 使用屬性擴充中繼資料

summary.span: 使用預設屬性，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with default properties.
